Package com.ibm.security.verifysdk

Class HotpGeneratorContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.security.verifysdk.OtpGeneratorContext
      • com.ibm.security.verifysdk.HotpGeneratorContext
  • @RequiresApi(23)
public class HotpGeneratorContext
extends OtpGeneratorContext
    Implementation to calculate a hash-based one-time password according to https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc4226
    Since:
    2.0.0
    Version:
    2.1.5

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.ibm.security.verifysdk.OtpGeneratorContext

    • Constructor Detail

      • HotpGeneratorContext

        public HotpGeneratorContext​(@NonNull
                            java.lang.String secret,
                            int digits,
                            @NonNull
                            HmacAlgorithm algorithm,
                            int counter)
                     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Creates a new HotpGeneratorContext instance with the given data.
        Parameters:
        secret - the static symmetric key, has to be at least 2 characters (non whitespace).
        digits - the required length of the one-time password, has to be 6 or 8.
        algorithm - the algorithm that has to be used.
        counter - the initial counter for the calculation, has to be ≥ 0.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any argument is null or out of boundaries.

      • HotpGeneratorContext

        public HotpGeneratorContext​(@NonNull
                            java.lang.String secret,
                            int counter)
                     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Creates a new HotpGeneratorContext object with the values secret and counter.

        The default value is used for the length of the one-time password (6) and the algorithm (HmacAlgorithm.SHA1).

        Parameters:
        secret - the static symmetric key, has to be at least 2 characters (non whitespace).
        counter - the initial counter for the calculation, has to be ≥ 0.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any argument is null or out of boundaries.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public java.lang.String create()
        Returns an one-time password.
        Overrides:
        create in class OtpGeneratorContext
        Returns:
        • the generated one-time password value
        • null if the OTP could not be created

      • create

        protected java.lang.String create​(long counter)
                           throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Returns an one-time password.
        Overrides:
        create in class OtpGeneratorContext
        Parameters:
        counter - the counter to use for this calculation, has to be ≥ 0.
        Returns:
        • the generated one-time password value.
        • null if the OTP could not be created.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if counter is < 0.
